guides.title: Master Guide & Navigation
guides.description: Entry point with learning paths, navigation by playstyle, terminology glossary, and recommended progressions for different skill levels.

guides.title: Game Fundamentals & Core Mechanics
guides.description: Foundation covering map structure, 5 roles, experience, gold, items, structures (turrets/inhibitors/nexus), Dragon/Baron, minions, vision control, and winning conditions.

guides.title: Farming, CS & Wave Control
guides.description: Complete guide to last-hitting, CS benchmarks by rank, 3 wave control strategies (push/freeze/slow-push), farming efficiency, role-specific farming, and 5 progressive practice drills.

guides.title: Micro vs Macro: Mechanics vs Strategy
guides.description: Balance between individual mechanics (micro) and strategic decision-making (macro), including role-specific ratios (Top 60/40, Jungle 40/60, Mid 50/50, ADC 70/30, Support 30/70) and integration strategies.

guides.title: Team Composition & Synergies
guides.description: Build balanced teams using 6 essential elements, 5 synergy types (engage/poke/protect/dive/split-push), win conditions, and counter-composition strategies with 4 detailed examples.

guides.title: Professional Drafting & Pick/Ban Strategy
guides.description: Pro-level drafting guide covering 10-ban system, 4 banning strategies, 4 picking strategies, phase breakdown (B1-R5), Blue vs Red advantages, and professional team styles.

guides.title: Comprehensive Index & Integration
guides.description: Master index with content statistics, 4 learning paths, AI feedback templates, metrics tracking, and integration guidelines for AI coaching systems.
